trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una vista en tiempo de diseño de los datos de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner" /> primario.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la vista del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView" /> class using the provided data source designer and name of the view.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDesignerDataSourceView" /> utilizando el diseñador de origen de datos proporcionado y el nombre de la vista.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite paginación de los datos que recupera el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if paging through the data retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite la paginación de los datos que recupera el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows instead of the data itself.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite la recuperación del número total de filas de datos en lugar de los propios datos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if retrieving the total number of data rows is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si admite la recuperación del número total de filas de datos; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite una vista ordenada del origen de datos subyacente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a sorted view on the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite una vista ordenada en el origen de datos subyacente; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> actual admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: Número mínimo de filas que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que los datos devueltos son datos de ejemplo; <see langword="false" /> para indicar que los datos devueltos son datos activos.

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the provided number of rows and returns a value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Genera datos en tiempo de diseño que coinciden con el esquema del control de origen de datos asociado mediante el número de filas proporcionado y devuelve un valor que indica si los datos son datos reales o de ejemplo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object containing data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> que contiene datos que se mostrarán en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un esquema que describe la vista del origen de datos que representa este objeto de vista.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />.
